item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description:
Welcome to Restoration Lab, a dedicated Naprapathy clinic nestled in the heart of Albuquerque. Founded and led by Doctors Alicia Martinez and Kathleen Harris, our practice blends deep expertise with a compassionate, patient‑centered approach to help you achieve lasting health and well‑being.

Who We Are

At Restoration Lab, we believe that true wellness stems from a balanced musculoskeletal system. Our founders, Dr. Kathleen and Dr. Alicia, are licensed Naprapaths with years of clinical experience treating a wide range of musculoskeletal conditions—from chronic back pain and sports injuries to everyday tension and postural strain. Their shared commitment to evidence‑based care and personalized treatment forms the cornerstone of our clinic.
